page.title: 19Arts and Entertainment
page.content: The main centres for entertainment and the arts in Tonbridge are the{Oast {Theatre,The Angel Centre, Tonbridge {School and Tonbridge Castle.}The Angel Centre holds a wide spectrum of entertainment being used for Discos,Concerts,Fashion Shows,Plays,Art and Craft Fairs.The Oast Theatre,is based in a converted Oast House,and is run by{Tonbridge {Theatre}and{Arts Club,}is used almost weekly for a production.The{Mitre {Public House}is used for rehearsals, and the club also has a photographic society and young theatre group. {Tonbridge School Hall}is used for musical concerts.These are normally organised by the{Tonbridge Choral & {Philharmonic Society. Other clubs and societies include {Tonbridge Music Club}and{Tonbridge {Camera Club.
